mapper.sql: ID, TITLE, SUMMARY, URL, TYPE, ARTICLE_TYPE, UID, CODE, READ_COUNT, COMMENT_COUNT, NICE_COUNT, PV,STATUS, PUBLISHTIME, UPDATETIME

update.foreach: update t_t_travel_info set pv=IFNULL(pv,0)+#{pv} where id=#{id}

mapper.select: SELECT t1.infoCount,t2.draffCount FROM( SELECT UID,STATUS,count(*) infoCount FROM t_t_travel_info c GROUP BY UID,STATUS HAVING c.UID=#{vo.uid} and c.`STATUS`='30')t1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT UID,STATUS,count(*) draffCount FROM t_t_travel_info c GROUP BY UID,STATUS HAVING c.UID=#{vo.uid} and c.`STATUS`='10') t2 ON t1.UID=t2.UID

SELECT t1.*,t2.NICKNAME,1 mold FROM t_t_travel_info t1 INNER JOIN t_a_oauth t2 on t1.UID = t2.U_ID and t2.OAUTH_TYPE='email' and (t1.TITLE like "%"#{vo.title}"%" or t1.SUMMARY LIKE "%"#{vo.title}"%")
and t1.type=#{vo.type}

choose.when: SELECT c.*,a.NICKNAME,a.AVATAR FROM T_T_TRAVEL_INFO c, T_A_OAUTH a WHERE a.OAUTH_TYPE='email' AND a.U_ID=c.UID AND c.`STATUS` ='30' order by c.PUBLISHTIME DESC
choose.otherwise: SELECT t1.*,t2.NICKNAME,t2.AVATAR,IFNULL(t3.STATUS,'0') niceStatus,t3.UID niceUid FROM T_T_TRAVEL_INFO t1 INNER JOIN T_A_OAUTH t2 ON t1.UID= t2.U_ID AND t2.OAUTH_TYPE='email' and t1.`STATUS` ='30' LEFT JOIN t_t_nice t3 ON t1.ID=t3.TID and t3.uid=#{vo.loginUid} order by t1.PUBLISHTIME DESC

choose.when: SELECT t1.*,t2.NICKNAME,t2.AVATAR FROM T_T_TRAVEL_INFO t1 INNER JOIN T_A_OAUTH t2 ON t1.UID= t2.U_ID AND t2.OAUTH_TYPE='email' and t1.STATUS='30' AND t1.ID=#{vo.id}
choose.otherwise: SELECT t1.*,t2.NICKNAME,t2.AVATAR,IFNULL(t3.`STATUS`,'0') niceStatus,t3.UID niceUid FROM T_T_TRAVEL_INFO t1 INNER JOIN T_A_OAUTH t2 ON t1.UID= t2.U_ID AND t2.OAUTH_TYPE='email' and t1.STATUS='30' AND t1.ID=#{vo.id} LEFT JOIN t_t_nice t3 ON t1.ID=t3.TID and t3.uid=#{vo.loginUid}
